text: The Liechtenstein Football Association (LFV) () is the governing body of football in Liechtenstein. It was founded on 28 April 1934. In 1974, they became part of FIFA and UEFA. The association organizes the Liechtenstein national football team and the Liechtenstein Football Cup. == Other websites == * Official website * Liechtenstein at FIFA site * Liechtenstein at UEFA site Category:1934 establishments in Europe Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe Category:Football in Liechtenstein Category:Sports organizations of Liechtenstein
title: Liechtenstein Football Association
